title: Making a Competitive team/ dynamic que group  Plat+
body:
Hey there guys.

I'm looking to make a team for competitive play and also to play as a group of 5 in ranked.


I'm in need for a top/jng/mid/adc. 

Looking for players who know the game, can understand lane match ups but also have some sort of map awareness.
also need players not to rage or flame at each other we will be a team, we stick by each other if we lose 10 games in a row, if you can't handle losing then don't put in a application. I need mature players who will give constructive criticism but also help the other person understand why and what they did wrong and how they can improve on it.. We are all still learning the game so everyone needs to work on everything and if you think you don't then don't apply... 

I need players who can put in the effort into the team, everyone needs to be able to put effort into the team or we won't get anywhere.  If you are a person to quit once it gets hard don't apply, i don't want you. I need strong and resilient players.  

We can discuss the name of the team or whatever later, I'm just looking for decent players to begin our ascent into higher divisions.


Please fill out this application below..

IGN:
age: 
Mic: 
Lane:
Champion pool:
Main champions (3):
Times you can play: 
Strengths:
weakness: 
Why do you want to join?: 

Thanks for reading guys.
                              Have a nice day/afternoon/night?

replies.body:
IGN: Doctor Jekyll
age: 21
Mic: Yes
Lane: Top/JG
Champion pool: Gangplank (Lv 7), urgot, maokai, trundle, darius, graves, gnar, malphite, lulu, hecarim (The list goes on forever, i have 377 mastery points so i play a huge pool)
Main champions (3): Gangplank, Trundle, Maokai (toplane). Kindred, Zac, Hecarim (JG) 
Times you can play: All day, most of the night (until about 2am AEST)
Strengths: Very competitive and focused on growth (History in top teir Diablo 3 + WoW), very focused on the macro "getting the team ahead" as opposed to padding my KDA. Very willing to adapt and change my style/champions in order to suit the team.
weakness: Frequency of checking the map - I am using an alert timer to que me to check the map every couple of seconds to improve that. I have hardly played ekko and considering the meta that is something that needs to change, tank ekko can be very usefull in many team compositions so i might need to get some time on him.
Why do you want to join?: Because I want a solid, consistent competitive base to climb with. I am not a weekend warrior that plays games as a secondary thing. I play to compete (as i did in previous games) and i intend to do the same with league. I have a style that is very team oriented which makes solo Q difficult, and makes 5 man dynamic absolutely amazing to play in.
Just wondering if you're looking for any Rookie Analysts or Management staff unpaid?
